org.pipservices.container.refer

Class LinkReferencesDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pipservices.container.refer.ReferencesDecorator
      • org.pipservices.container.refer.LinkReferencesDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.pipservices.commons.refer.IReferences, org.pipservices.commons.run.IClosable, org.pipservices.commons.run.IOpenable

    public class LinkReferencesDecorator
extends ReferencesDecorator
implements org.pipservices.commons.run.IOpenable
    References decorator that automatically sets references to newly added components that implement IReferenceable interface and unsets references from removed components that implement IUnreferenceable interface.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Creates a new instance of the decorator.

      Creates a new instance of the decorator.

      • remove

        public Object remove(Object locator)
              throws org.pipservices.commons.errors.ApplicationException
        Removes a previously added reference that matches specified locator. If many references match the locator, it removes only the first one. When all references shall be removed, use removeAll() method instead.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface org.pipservices.commons.refer.IReferences
        Overrides:
        remove in class ReferencesDecorator
        Parameters:
        locator - a locator to remove reference
        Returns:
        the removed component reference.
        Throws:
        org.pipservices.commons.errors.ApplicationException - when error occured.
        See Also:
        removeAll(Object)

      • removeAll

        public List<Object> removeAll(Object locator)
                       throws org.pipservices.commons.errors.ApplicationException
        Removes all component references that match the specified locator.
        Specified by:
        removeAll in interface org.pipservices.commons.refer.IReferences
        Overrides:
        removeAll in class ReferencesDecorator
        Parameters:
        locator - the locator to remove references by.
        Returns:
        a list, containing all removed references.
        Throws:
        org.pipservices.commons.errors.ApplicationException - when error occured.
